name: Compact Stylus Manager [Chrome]
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
Compacts the Style Manager page to save space by using two columns instead of one. Disabled styles get an easy to spot 'Disabled' background. Not compatible with any other styles that re-style this page, but if you like the idea of a compact 2-column layout, you can just copy some of the code.
